headline.main: SUPPER DANCE AIDS CHILDREN IN LONDON; Friends of Britain Benefit for Lord Mayor's Fund

lead_paragraph: A benefit supper dance was given last night at Fefe's Monte Carlo under the auspices of the American Friends of Britain, of which Mrs. George Seymour Repton is founder and national chairman. The proceeds will be donated to the Lord Mayor of London Fund to purchase warm, clothing for war-afflicted children of London.
abstract: N Y C Amer Friends of Brit Lord Mayor's fund benefit to clothe child raid victims, London
